title: Science Education Program Design and Implementation in Informal Learning Environments

context.additional_context: Enhancing scientific inquiry skills and motivating higher education progression for individuals interested in STEM careers, within non-formal learning settings.

learning_goals: Apply scientific inquiry methods in non-formal learning environments to solve real-life problems
Enhance the ability to execute large-scale group projects and present results using online collaboration tools
Explore cutting-edge topics in physics, life sciences, chemistry, and computer science to foster a positive attitude toward scientific technology
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
